sky_docs_code_snippet_copy_to_clipboard_._description: The ARIA label for the copy-code-to-clipboard button
The message displayed to the user when the text is successfully saved to the clipboard

sky_docs_code_example_viewer_demo_hidden._description: The message displayed to the user when an example's demo is hidden
sky_docs_code_example_viewer_demo_hidden.message: Open this code example in StackBlitz to view the demo.

sky_docs_code_example_viewer_demo_stack_._description: The label for the button that launches the code example in StackBlitz

sky_docs_code_example_viewer_hide_code_b._description: The ARIA label for the button that hides the example code snippet

sky_docs_code_example_viewer_show_code_b._description: The ARIA label for the button that shows the example code snippet
